timeline.bodyText: just curious: why readBoolean being true indicates uiMetadata can be read from readMap()
timeline.author: yizheliu-amazon

replies.bodyText: We write true if uiMetadata is not null in the writeTo method: check https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/anomaly-detection/pull/322/files#diff-ab4bf6eb04e845b21b1182e30afb84c73b282bae5cc26dbcfef2e846211bcdecR248
replies.author: ylwu-amzn
